Text.Page:
I know that Elleon went to save the villagers and I understand that you're eager to help him.

But you have to know that finding out a cure is just as important.

Do you have the time to help me?"What kind of help do you need?"

I need to sneak back to Free Exodor's hideout.

Please defeat the dominators that are blocking the way.

Thank you so much. Now I can concentrate on my research.

I'll keep researching the cure, you go and rescue the villagers.
